Properties.ProtectedString:
Tool = script.Parent
local stillEquipped = false
function onEquippedLocal(mouse) stillEquipped = true if mouse == nil then print("Mouse not found") return end while stillEquipped do print("Setting Mouse to go") mouse.Icon = "rbxasset://textures\\GunCursor.png" while Tool.Enabled and stillEquipped do wait(0.01) end print("Setting Mouse to wait") mouse.Icon = "rbxasset://textures\\GunWaitCursor.png" while not Tool.Enabled and stillEquipped do wait(0.01) end end end
function onUnequippedLocal() stillEquipped = false end
Tool.Equipped:connect(onEquippedLocal) Tool.Unequipped:connect(onUnequippedLocal)

local Tool = script.Parent local Sai = Tool.Handle
Tool.Enabled = true
local vCharacter local leftSai
local damage = 25
function blow(hit) humanoid = hit.Parent:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") vCharacter = Tool.Parent myHumanoid = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") vPlayer = game.Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(vCharacter) if humanoid ~= nil and humanoid ~= myHumanoid and myHumanoid ~= nil then rightArm = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Right Arm") if rightArm then rightGrip = rightArm:FindFirstChild("RightGrip") if rightGrip and (rightGrip.Part0 == Sai or rightGrip.Part1 == Sai) then tagHumanoid(humanoid, vPlayer) humanoid:TakeDamage(damage) wait(1.0) untagHumanoid(humanoid) end end end end
function blow2(hit) humanoid = hit.Parent:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") vCharacter = Tool.Parent myHumanoid = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") vPlayer = game.Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(vCharacter) if humanoid ~= nil and humanoid ~= myHumanoid and myHumanoid ~= nil then leftArm = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Left Arm") if leftArm then leftGrip = leftArm:FindFirstChild("LeftGrip") if leftGrip and (leftGrip.Part0 == leftSai or leftGrip.Part1 == leftSai) then tagHumanoid(humanoid, vPlayer) humanoid:TakeDamage(damage) wait(1.0) untagHumanoid(humanoid) end end end end
function tagHumanoid(humanoid, player) if humanoid then creatorTag = Instance.new("ObjectValue") creatorTag.Value = player creatorTag.Name = "creator" creatorTag.Parent = humanoid end end
function untagHumanoid(humanoid) if humanoid then tag = humanoid:FindFirstChild("creator") if tag then tag:Remove() end end end
function onActivated() if Tool.Enabled == false then return end Tool.Enabled = false
wait(2.0) Tool.Enabled = true end
function onEquipped() vCharacter = Tool.Parent leftArm = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Left Arm") if leftArm then leftGrip = leftArm:FindFirstChild("LeftGrip") if leftGrip == nil and vCharacter:FindFirstChild("LeftSai") == nil then leftSai = Sai:Clone() leftSai.Name = "LeftSai" leftSai.Parent = vCharacter
leftGrip = Instance.new("Weld") leftGrip.Parent = leftArm leftGrip.Part0 = leftArm leftGrip.Part1 = leftSai leftGrip.C1 = (CFrame.new(Vector3.new(0, 0, 0)) * CFrame.Angles(math.pi, 0, math.pi/2)) + Vector3.new(-1.0, 0, -1.0) leftGrip.Name = "LeftGrip"
connection = leftSai.Touched:connect(blow2) end
myHumanoid = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") if myHumanoid then myHumanoid.WalkSpeed = 20 end end end
function onUnequipped() if vCharacter then leftArm = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Left Arm") myHumanoid = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") end if leftArm then leftGrip = leftArm:FindFirstChild("LeftGrip") leftSai = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("LeftSai") if leftGrip then leftGrip:Remove() end if leftSai then leftSai:Remove() end end
if connection then connection:disconnect() end
if myHumanoid then myHumanoid.WalkSpeed = 16 end
end
Tool.Activated:connect(onActivated) Tool.Equipped:connect(onEquipped) Tool.Unequipped:connect(onUnequipped)
Sai.Touched:connect(blow)
if leftSai then leftSai.Touched:connect(blow) end

local Tool = script.Parent local Sai = Tool.Handle
local dualAnim
local vCharacter
function onActivatedLocal() vCharacter = Tool.Parent
myHumanoid = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") if myHumanoid == nil then return end
dualAnim = myHumanoid:LoadAnimation(Tool.SaiSlash) if dualAnim then dualAnim:Play() end while Tool.Enabled == false do wait() end end
function onEquippedLocal() end
function onUnequippedLocal() if dualAnim then dualAnim:Stop() end end
Tool.Activated:connect(onActivatedLocal) Tool.Equipped:connect(onEquippedLocal) Tool.Unequipped:connect(onUnequippedLocal)
